author.description: The ID of the user who created the collection
author.title: author

collection_request.description: The ID of the collection request that this collection was matched to, if any
collection_request.title: collection_request

created.description: The date that the collection was created, in the UTC timezone. Format: 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ'
created.title: created

currency.description: The 3 letter ISO currency code for the collection
currency.title: currency

modified.description: The date that the collection was last modified, in the UTC timezone. Format: 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ'
modified.title: modified

organization.description: The ID of the organization that the collection was matched to
organization.title: organization

payment_date.description: The date that the collection was made, in the UTC timezone. Format: 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ'
payment_date.title: payment_date

phonenumber.description: The phone number that the collection was initiated from, in internation format starting with a +
phonenumber.title: phonenumber

reference.description: The description or reference code that was included with the collection
reference.title: reference

remote_transaction_id.description: The unique transaction ID from the mobile network operator
remote_transaction_id.title: remote_transaction_id

status.description: A string showing the status of the collection
status.title: status

updated_by.description: The ID of the user who last updated the collection
updated_by.title: updated_by
